PropertyDescription.Name: CAPACITY
PropertyDescription.Description: Capacity of an InventoryItem; 0 means unlimited

PropertyDescription.Name: LOT_SIZE
PropertyDescription.Description: Lot size of a PartType

PropertyDescription.Name: RESOURCE_STATUS
PropertyDescription.Description: Status of a Resource, can be one of BUSY, IDLE, BROKEN, UNDER_MAINTENANCE, UNKNOWN, BLOCKED, SETUP, NO_WORKING_TIME, PAUSED, WAIT_FOR_WORKER

PropertyDescription.Name: MTTR
PropertyDescription.Description: Mean Time To Repair of a Resource

PropertyDescription.Name: MTBF
PropertyDescription.Description: Mean Time Between Failure of a Resource

PropertyDescription.Name: AVAILABILITY
PropertyDescription.Description: Availabilty of a Resource; 0 >= value <= 100 %

PropertyDescription.Name: RELIABILITY
PropertyDescription.Description: Reliability of a Resource; Waste rate; 0 >= value <= 100 %

PropertyDescription.Name: SUPER_PART_TYPE
PropertyDescription.Description: Super type of a PartType

PropertyDescription.Name: SUPER_BILL_OF_MATERIALS
PropertyDescription.Description: Super type of a BillOfMaterials

PropertyDescription.Name: SUPER_PROCESS_PLAN
PropertyDescription.Description: Super type of a ProcessPlan

PropertyDescription.Name: SUPER_RESOURCE_CLASS
PropertyDescription.Description: Super type of a ResourceClass

PropertyDescription.Name: SUPER_RESOURCE
PropertyDescription.Description: Super type of a Resource

PropertyDescription.Name: RESULT_RESOURCE_UNPLANNED
PropertyDescription.Description: Result of a Resource: unplanned time

PropertyDescription.Name: RESULT_RESOURCE_WAITING
PropertyDescription.Description: Result of a Resource: waiting time

PropertyDescription.Name: RESULT_RESOURCE_BREAK
PropertyDescription.Description: Result of a Resource: break time

PropertyDescription.Name: RESULT_RESOURCE_SETUP
PropertyDescription.Description: Result of a Resource: setup time

PropertyDescription.Name: RESULT_RESOURCE_WORKING
PropertyDescription.Description: Result of a Resource: working time

PropertyDescription.Name: RESULT_RESOURCE_BLOCKED
PropertyDescription.Description: Result of a Resource: blocked time

PropertyDescription.Name: RESULT_RESOURCE_FAILED
PropertyDescription.Description: Result of a Resource: failed time

PropertyDescription.Name: RESULT_INVENTORY_ITEM_NOW
PropertyDescription.Description: Result of an InventoryItem: content now

PropertyDescription.Name: RESULT_INVENTORY_ITEM_MIN
PropertyDescription.Description: Result of an InventoryItem: minimal content

PropertyDescription.Name: RESULT_INVENTORY_ITEM_MAX
PropertyDescription.Description: Result of an InventoryItem: maximal content

PropertyDescription.Name: RESULT_INVENTORY_ITEM_MAX_WAIT
PropertyDescription.Description: Result of an InventoryItem: maximal waiting

PropertyDescription.Name: RESULT_INVENTORY_ITEM_AVG
PropertyDescription.Description: Result of an InventoryItem: average content

PropertyDescription.Name: RESULT_INVENTORY_ITEM_AVG_WAIT
PropertyDescription.Description: Result of an InventoryItem: average waiting

PropertyDescription.Name: dummyStochastic
PropertyDescription.Description: dummyStochastic
